text: The following questions aim to capture your experience of COVID and related lockdowns. There are no correct or incorrect options.
Please select one of the following options that best represents how much you adjusted your lifestyle in response to COVID and related lockdowns.
answers: I am living as normal|I am not self-isolating but have cut down my usual activities as a precaution|I am not self-isolating but have been told to work from home|I am self-isolating as I do not want to get ill, but I am not high risk|I am self-isolating as I do not want to get ill, but I am regarded as high risk|I am self-isolating as I do not want others to get ill|I have been told to self-isolate due to possible symptoms of COVID-19|I have been told to self-isolate due to a diagnosis of COVID-19|I have been ordered by the government or local authority to self-isolate/stay home
